00017 CEndingEp1::CEndingEp1(CMap &map, std::vector<CPlayer> &Player, bool &hideobjects) :
00018  CFinale(map),
00019  m_Player(Player),
00020  m_hideobjects(hideobjects)
00021 {
00022  m_Episode = 1;
00023  m_step = 0;
00024  m_starttime = g_pTimer->getTicks();
00025  m_timepassed = 0;
00026  m_mustsetup = true;
00027  m_mustfinishgame = false;
00028  mp_Textbox = NULL;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void CEndingEp1::process()
00032 {
00033  m_timepassed = g_pTimer->getTicks() - m_starttime;
00034 
00035  switch(m_step)
00036  {
00037  case 0: ReturnsToShip(); break;
00038  case 1: ShipFlyMarsToEarth(); break;
00039  case 2: BackAtHome(); break;
00040  case 3: ShipFlyEarthToMShip(); break;
00041  case 4: showEndingText(); break;
00042  default:
00043   m_mustfinishgame = true;
00044   break;
00045  }
00046 }
00047 
00048 void CEndingEp1::ReturnsToShip()
00049 {
00050  if(m_mustsetup)
00051  {
00052   //Initialization
00053   m_Map.gotoPos( 40, 540 );
00054 
00055        // draw keen next to his ship
00056   m_Player[0].hideplayer = false;
00057   m_Player[0].solid = false;
00058   m_Player[0].moveTo(6636, 19968);
00059   m_Player[0].sprite = PMAPLEFTFRAME;
00060 
00061   while(m_Player[0].scrollTriggers()); // Scroll the map to players position
00062 
00063   mp_Textbox = new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP1_ESEQ_PART1"), true);
00064 
00065   m_mustsetup = false;
00066  }
00067 
00068  if( m_timepassed<50000 && !g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00069  {
00070   // perform a machine typing like dialog.
00071   mp_Textbox->process();
00072  }
00073  else
00074  {
00075   // Shutdown code here!
00076   m_step++;
00077   m_mustsetup = true;
00078   delete mp_Textbox;
00079   mp_Textbox = NULL;
00080  }
00081 }
00082 
00083 void CEndingEp1::ShipFlyMarsToEarth()
00084 {
00085  if(m_mustsetup)
00086  {
00087   //Initialization
00088   std::string path = m_Map.m_gamepath;
00089   CMapLoader MapLoader(&m_Map, &m_Player);
00090   MapLoader.load(1, 81, path);
00091 
00092   m_Player[0].hideplayer = false;
00093   m_Player[0].moveTo(6<<CSF, 5<<CSF);
00094 
00095   mp_ShipFlySys = new CShipFlySys( m_Player[0], &m_Map, SPR_SHIP_RIGHT, SPR_SHIP_LEFT);
00096 
00097   m_Map.gotoPos(0,0);
00098   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 60, DUP);
00099   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 12, 0);
00100   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 673, DDOWNRIGHT);
00101   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 25, 0);
00102   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 120, DDOWN);
00103   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 18, 0);
00104   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_SPAWNSPR, 0, SPR_QUESTION);
00105   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_DISABLESCROLLING, 0, 0);
00106   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 88, 0);
00107   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_REMOVESPR, 0, 0);
00108   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 12, 0);
00109   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 175, DLEFT);
00110   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 38, 0);
00111   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_SPAWNSPR, 0, SPR_EXCLAMATION);
00112   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 125, 0);
00113   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_REMOVESPR, 0, 0);
00114   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 12, 0);
00115   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 175, DRIGHT);
00116   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 6, 0);
00117   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_ENABLESCROLLING, 0, 0);
00118   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 116, DDOWN);
00119   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_FADEOUT, 0, 0);
00120   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 25, DDOWN);
00121   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_ENDOFQUEUE, 0, 0);
00122   m_Map.drawAll();
00123   mp_ShipFlySys->m_ShipQueuePtr = 0;
00124 
00125   m_mustsetup = false;
00126  }
00127 
00128  if( !mp_ShipFlySys->EndOfQueue() && !g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00129  {
00130   // process the normal ship flying level and do all the inited commands
00131   mp_ShipFlySys->process();
00132  }
00133  else
00134  {
00135   // Shutdown code here!
00136   delete mp_ShipFlySys;
00137   mp_ShipFlySys = NULL;
00138   m_step++;
00139   m_mustsetup = true;
00140  }
00141 }
00142 
00143 void CEndingEp1::BackAtHome()
00144 {
00145  if(m_mustsetup)
00146  {
00147   //Initialization
00148   m_hideobjects = true;
00149   m_Map.gotoPos(0,0);
00150   m_Map.resetScrolls(); // The Scrollsurface must be (0,0) so the bitmap is correctly drawn
00151   m_Map.m_animation_enabled = false; // Needed, because the other map is still loaded
00152   m_Player[0].hideplayer = true;
00153   mp_FinaleStaticScene = new CFinaleStaticScene(m_Map.m_gamepath, "finale.ck1");
00154 
00155   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE1", 6000);
00156   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE2", 6000);
00157   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE3", 6000);
00158   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE4", 5000);
00159   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE5", 5000);
00160   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE6", 6000);
00161   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE7", 6000);
00162   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE8", 8000);
00163 
00164   // The Bitmaps of the Window Lights on should drawn at Page 4
00165   mp_FinaleStaticScene->showBitmapAt("WINDON", 2, 6, 80, 0);
00166   mp_FinaleStaticScene->showBitmapAt("WINDOFF", 6, 8, 80, 0);
00167 
00168   m_mustsetup = false;
00169  }
00170 
00171  if( !mp_FinaleStaticScene->mustclose() )
00172  {
00173   mp_FinaleStaticScene->process();
00174  }
00175  else
00176  {
00177   // Shutdown code here!
00178   delete mp_FinaleStaticScene;
00179   mp_FinaleStaticScene = NULL;
00180   m_Map.m_animation_enabled = true;
00181   m_step++;
00182   m_mustsetup = true;
00183  }
00184 }

00186 void CEndingEp1::ShipFlyEarthToMShip()
00187 {
00188  if(m_mustsetup)
00189  { //Initialization
00190   int x, y;
00191   m_hideobjects = false;
00192   std::string path = m_Map.m_gamepath;
00193   CMapLoader MapLoader(&m_Map, &m_Player);
00194   MapLoader.load(1, 81, path);
00195 
00196   m_Player[0].hideplayer = false;
00197   x = 48<<CSF;
00198   y = 23<<CSF;
00199   m_Player[0].moveTo(x,y);
00200 
00201   m_Map.gotoPos((x>>STC)-100, (y>>STC)-160);
00202 
00203   mp_ShipFlySys = new CShipFlySys( m_Player[0], &m_Map, SPR_SHIP_RIGHT, SPR_SHIP_LEFT);
00204 
00205   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 58, DUP);
00206   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_DISABLESCROLLING, 0, 0);
00207   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_WAIT, 13, DUPLEFT);
00208   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 208, DLEFT);
00209   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_FADEOUT, 0, 0);
00210   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_MOVE, 25, DDOWN);
00211   mp_ShipFlySys->addShipQueue(CMD_ENDOFQUEUE, 0, 0);
00212 
00213   m_Map.drawAll();
00214   mp_ShipFlySys->m_ShipQueuePtr = 0;
00215 
00216   m_mustsetup = false;
00217  }
00218 
00219  if( !mp_ShipFlySys->EndOfQueue() && !g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00220  {
00221   // process the normal ship flying level and do all the inited commands
00222   mp_ShipFlySys->process();
00223  }
00224  else
00225  {
00226   // Shutdown code here!
00227   delete mp_ShipFlySys;
00228   mp_ShipFlySys = NULL;
00229   m_step++;
00230   m_mustsetup = true;
00231  }
00232 }
